des:
Your favorite entertainment is just a few words away. Ask Alexa to find movies and shows, pause, launch channels, and more on your Roku devices.

Examples of how you can use Alexa to control media playback on your Roku devices:

“Alexa, pause on kitchen Roku”
“Alexa, launch Netflix on living room Roku”
“Alexa, go home on office Roku”
“Alexa, find documentaries on bedroom Roku”

If you have a Roku TV, you can also ask Alexa to do things like:

“Alexa, turn on kitchen Roku”***
“Alexa, turn up the volume on living room Roku”
“Alexa, mute on office Roku”
“Alexa, change to channel 5.1 on bedroom Roku”****
“Alexa, switch to HDMI 2 on living room Roku”

*** You must have Fast TV Start enabled on your Roku TV to use Alexa voice commands to turn on your TV.
**** You must have an HDTV antenna connected to your Roku TV to use Alexa voice commands to change channels on your TV tuner.

How to get started:

It’s easy to use Alexa to control media playback on your Roku devices. Just follow these steps:


1.) Click “Enable” at the top of this skills page to begin setup. 
2.) Log into your Roku account using your Roku login credentials. 
3.) After login, accept Terms and Conditions, if you agree. Click “Continue to Alexa App.”
4.) Click “Next” if Roku successfully links with Alexa.
5.) You should now see a "Device Discovery" screen. Let this complete. 
6.) You will see one or more "Roku" devices on the screen. Select one and continue. (If you are not able to select a “Roku” device you may need to tap on “Manage Devices” in the Roku Skill home screen in the Alexa app to complete this step.) 
7.) Next, select the Amazon device(s) you want to enable for controlling your Roku device(s).
8.) You should now see a screen with "Your linked Devices". And that’s it! You can now use Alexa to control your Roku device.
9.) You can repeat steps 6 to 8 to link any additional Roku devices you want to control with Alexa.

You must have a supported Roku device running Roku OS 8.1 or above and a Roku account to use this skill.

Supported Roku devices:

All Roku TV models. 

Roku streaming player models: Roku Express (3700, 3900, 3930), Roku Express+ (3710, 3910, 3931), Roku Express 4K (3940), Roku Express 4K+ (3941), Roku Streaming Stick (3600,3800), Roku Streaming Stick+ (3810X, 3811), Roku 2 (4210), Roku 3 (4200, 4230), Roku 4 (4400), Roku Premiere (3920, 4620X, Roku Premiere+ (3921, 4630), Roku Streambar (9102), Roku Streambar Pro (9101R2), Roku Smart Soundbar (9101) Roku Ultra (4640, 4660, 4661, 4670, 4800), and Roku Ultra LT (4662)
